_comment: It reads from the 'dev' config in database.json to connect to that DB.->**when you are using local db i.e postgres change user,password to 'root' and host to 'localhost' and ->*********when  host i.e postgres db  is managed automatically so change user,password to 'user_service' and host to 'user-service.c47awawo6dzh.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com', ->**********when  host i.e postgres db  is managed manually so change user,password to 'user_service' and host to 'ec2-52-91-81-127.compute-1.amazonaws.com'
